name: SelectScrollDownArrow
description:
An element that scrolls the select menu down when hovered.
Renders a `<div>` element.

keepMounted.description: Whether to keep the HTML element in the DOM while the select menu is not scrollable.

data-direction.description: Indicates the direction of the arrow.

data-side.description: Indicates which side the arrow is positioned relative to the select.

data-visible.description: Present when the arrow is visible.
